title: TS- Móðurborð - FM2A88X Extreme6+ (sokkull FM2 og FM2+)

posts.text:
Til sölu amd móðurborð.
FM2A88X Extreme6+
Socket FM2+
Memory: 4x DDR3-2600+(OC)/ 2400(OC)/ 2133/ 1866/ 1600/ 1333/ 1066 DIMM Slots, Dual Channel, Non-ECC, Unbuffered, Max Capacity of 64GB
Slots: 2x PCI-Express 3.0 x16 Slots (one runs at x16, dual run at x8), 1x PCI-Express 2.0 x16 Slot (runs at x4), 2x PCI Express 2.0 x1 Slots, 2x PCI Slots
SATA: 7x SATA3 Ports
Ports: 6x USB 3.0 Ports (4 rear, 2 via header), 8x USB 2.0 Ports (2 rear, 6 via headers), 1x eSATA Port, 1x PS/2 Mouse/Keyboard Port, 1x VGA Port, 1x DVI-D Port, 2x HDMI Ports, 1x DisplayPort, 1x Optical S/PDIF Out, 1x RJ45 LAN Port, Audio I/O Jacks
Form Factor: ATX
fult af möguleikum...
Selst vegna uppfærslu yfir i micro tölvukassa.
Var tekið úr notkun rétt í þessu i fullkonu standi.
Verð út úr búð í dag.  20þ.
http://kisildalur.is/?p=2&id=2541
Verðhugmynd 13þ.
http://www.asrock.com/mb/AMD/FM2A88X%20Extreme6+/?cat=Specifications
